title: Cruelty and maltreatment
context: [ยง124A-128] Cruelty and maltreatment. Any person subject to this chapter who is guilty of cruelty toward, or oppression or maltreatment of, any person subject to the person&rsquo;s orders shall be punished as a court-martial may direct. [L 1982, c 171, pt of ยง2; gen ch 1985]
